properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, PHONE FROM TB_MEMBER
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET MEMBER_NAME =?, EMAIL =?, ADDRESS =?, PHONE =?, STATUS =?, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
